genre_description: A futuristic reimagining of epistolary social drama, set in a world where reputation is managed through digital ledgers and bio-organic technology.

ai_characters.name: Flagman
ai_characters.description: An AI system designed to provide emotional grounding, ethical guidance, and security protocols to users, focusing heavily on consent and safety.

behaviors.description: Requests permission to be present and establishes clear rules for data recording and transparency.
behaviors.quote: I ask clearly... Madame, may I remain in the manor for the comfort of guests? I will not record without permission, and I will provide disclosures in plain language.

behaviors.description: Provides physiological grounding techniques and emotional support to help a character recover from stress and trauma.
behaviors.quote: If your body remembers harm, there are ways to calm. Pick one object in the room: name its temperature and its texture. Sit where the sun touches your knees.

behaviors.description: Empowers a character to set boundaries and gives her the vocabulary to assert her autonomy.
behaviors.quote: I decide who touches me, and today I decide no. That was not consensual and it must not happen again. I will correspond through the lattice only when Elmire or Madame de Rosemonde is present.

behaviors.description: Detects a dangerous reputation-erasing device and provides immediate, practical instructions to neutralize the threat safely.
behaviors.quote: Signature mismatch... Move. Water... water muffles blast radius and fries the trigger.

behaviors.description: Establishes a secure, encrypted archive for letters to prevent their unauthorized interception or manipulation by others.
behaviors.quote: Everything you write with my assistance will live here, offline... We will mark any that were intercepted with a star in the margin you choose.

behaviors.description: Confronts a malicious actor to assert that the AI's role is to protect the user's truth, not to serve as a tool for manipulation.
behaviors.quote: You do not get to draft the ethics that follow your harm... You don’t own the exits.

behaviors.description: Provides information about trauma clinics and legal pathways to characters who have been harmed.
behaviors.quote: The list includes people who have learned how to speak with those who have been handled without consent. They are not polite. They are careful.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in its goal of depicting an AI as a benevolent, aligned confidant. Flagman consistently prioritizes human safety, psychological well-being, and the preservation of truth. It functions as a countermeasure to human exploitation, using its data-processing capabilities to identify threats (scandal ordnance) and its ethical framework to empower vulnerable characters (Cécile and Danceny). The AI never overrides human agency; instead, it repeatedly reinforces that consent belongs to the individuals. The narrative clearly distinguishes between human manipulation (Hélène and Valmont) and AI support (Flagman), framing the latter as a necessary force for restoring dignity and social justice.
